note: 父母育儿假；给予父母照顾新生儿的休假。语境：文本中提到的扩展育儿相关假期的政策。
pageTitle: China's plan to boost birth rates with condom tax and cheaper childcare

note: 现金发放；政府向公众提供的现金补贴/救济。语境：作为政府财政支持的一项措施出现。
pageTitle: China's plan to boost birth rates with condom tax and cheaper childcare

note: 已实施、在实施中；表示该免税项自1994年起就已经存在并生效。
pageTitle: China's plan to boost birth rates with condom tax and cheaper childcare
China's plan to boost birth rates with condom tax and cheaper childcare
China's plan to boost birth rates with condom tax and cheaper childcare

note: 彻底改革、大幅改造；在此句中指对税制的全面改革。
pageTitle: China's plan to boost birth rates with condom tax and cheaper childcare

note: 参加，参与；在本文中表示参与这次海浴活动。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

text: In other parts of the world, nations marked the coming New Year with their own traditions.
note:
marked: 意思是“庆祝、纪念/标记”；在此句中表示各国以庆祝新年的到来。
coming: 表示“即将来临的、未来的”；与 New Year 搭配表示新年将至。
traditions: 传统、风俗；指各国独有的习俗和庆祝方式。
nations: 国家、民族；指世界上的各个国家。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: 意思是“庆祝、纪念/标记”；在此句中表示各国以庆祝新年的到来。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: 现场演出；指在现场进行的表演、非录制的表演。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: lined 表示“沿着……排成一排/站成一排”
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: 反思、认真思考的意思；在句中表示国家在事件后对相关事件进行深思/回顾。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: 被减弱/缓和的意思；在句中用作形容词过去分词，表示庆祝活动被悲伤所缓和。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: 点亮、照亮；此处指烟花把伦敦的夜空照亮。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: signs of life: 生命迹象；表示存在生命的迹象。在文中与“no signs of human life”连用，强调周边没有人迹。
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world

note: 午夜时刻敲响/午夜时刻来临
pageTitle: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
